sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import './styles.css' export default function ListingAd({ store }) { const { pic, title, address, description, psf_min, psf_max, subprice_label, availabilities_label, project_type, ownership_type, year, } = store const [click, setClick] = useState(false) const handleClick = () => { setClick(!click) } const formatted_description = description.split('\n').map((line, index) => {
}) const per_square_foot = `$${psf_min.toLocaleString()} - $${psf_max.toLocaleString()} psf` const properties_type = `${project_type} · ${year} · ${ownership_type}` return (

{title}

{address}

{properties_type}

{availabilities_label}

{per_square_foot}

{subprice_label}

{click && (

{description}

)}
) }
